      • NamedStream

        public NamedStream​(File file)
            throws FileNotFoundException
        Constructor from a file. The inputStream will be set to a FileInputStream for the file, and name will be set to the file's name.
        Parameters:
        file - File for the stream.
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException - If file doesn't exist.

        public long save​(File directory)
          throws IOException
        Saves the named stream as a file into the given directory.
        Parameters:
